item.title: Compiling Errors
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Try this, post again on this thread if it does not work:

[code]else if(command.startsWith(“demote”) &&

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Spike”)) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
playerRights = 0;
saveMoreInfo();
saveChar();
disconnected = true;
sM(name+" is no longer a member of the Staff.");
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist.");
}
}[/code]
If this does not work you are missing the method, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling Errors
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

You have to format it to that of a 317. Like, on old servers: sendMessage is the command, but on 317s, its now client.sendMessage. Try adding client.“whatever you have now”.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling Errors
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

I added this command into my 317…

[code]else if(command.startsWith(“demote”) &&

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Spike”)) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
playerRights = 0;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
disconnected = true;
sM(name+" is no longer a member of the Staff.");
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist.");
}
}[/code]

After I added that, I got a few errors:

client.java:9252: cannot find symbol symbol : method savemoreinfo() location: class client savemoreinfo(); ^ client.java:9253: cannot find symbol symbol : method savechar() location: class client savechar(); ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
